00045 TableFile::TableFile(char delim, char comment, bool useRowNames, bool useColNames) 
00046   : m_Delim(delim), m_Comment(comment), m_UseRowNames(useRowNames), m_UseColNames(useColNames) {
00047 }

00052 TableFile::~TableFile() {
00053   unsigned int i;
00054   for(i = 0; i < m_MemToFree.size(); i++) {
00055     char *p = m_MemToFree[i];
00056     delete [] p;
00057   }
00058 }

00065 unsigned int TableFile::colIndex(const char *colName) {
00066   assert(colName);
00067   TMapConstIter iter = m_ColNameMap.find((char *)colName);
00068   if(iter == m_ColNameMap.end())
00069     return npos;
00070 
00071   return iter->second;
00072 }

00079 unsigned int TableFile::rowIndex(const char *rowName) {
00080   assert(rowName);
00081   TMapConstIter iter = m_RowNameMap.find((char *)rowName);
00082   if(iter == m_RowNameMap.end())
00083     return npos;
00084 
00085   return iter->second;
00086 }

00093 bool TableFile::open(const char *fileName) {
00094   std::vector<string> requiredCols;
00095   return open(fileName, requiredCols);
00096 }

00104 bool TableFile::open(const char *fileName, const std::vector<std::string> &requiredCols) {
00105   assert(fileName);
00106   vector<bool> found(requiredCols.size());
00107   vector<string> words;
00108   char *name = NULL;
00109   int rowOffset = 0;
00110   unsigned int i = 0;
00111   int count = 0;
00112   RowFile rf;
00113   rowOffset = (m_UseRowNames == true) ? 1 : 0;
00114   rf.open(fileName);
00115 
00116   /* Read in any header. */
00117   rf.readHeader(rf, m_Header, m_HeaderLines);
00118 
00119   /* Read in column names. */
00120   if(!(rf.nextRow(words)) || words.empty())
00121     Err::errAbort("Nothing after header in file: " + string(fileName));
00122 
00123   if(m_UseColNames) {
00124     /* Read in the column header names. */
00125     for(i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00126       name = Util::cloneString(words[i].c_str());
00127       m_MemToFree.push_back(name);
00128       
00129       /* Was this a required column? */
00130       for(unsigned int requiredIx = 0; requiredIx < requiredCols.size(); requiredIx++) {
00131         if(requiredCols[requiredIx] == name) {
00132           found[requiredIx] = true;
00133         }
00134       }
00135       if(m_ColNameMap.find(name) != m_ColNameMap.end())
00136         Verbose::out(1, "Warning: Duplicate name: " + words[i] + 
00137                      " in column headers from file: " + Util::fileRoot(fileName));
00138       m_ColNameMap[name] = m_ColNames.size();
00139       m_ColNames.push_back(words[i]);
00140     }
00141     /* Check to make sure we found the required column names. */
00142     for(unsigned int requiredIx = 0; requiredIx < requiredCols.size(); requiredIx++) {
00143       if(found[requiredIx] == false) {
00144         Err::errAbort("Didn't find required column name: '" + 
00145                         requiredCols[requiredIx] + "' in file: " + fileName);
00146       }
00147     }
00148   }
00149   else {
00150     rf.reuseLine();
00151   }
00152   /* Read in each row. */
00153   while(rf.nextRow(words)) {
00154     string nameSpoof;
00155     // Spoof the column names if not being read.
00156     if(!m_UseColNames && m_Data.empty()) {
00157       unsigned int colIx = 0;
00158       if(m_UseRowNames)
00159         colIx = 1;
00160       for(colIx = colIx; colIx < words.size(); colIx++) {
00161         m_ColNames.push_back(ToStr(colIx));
00162       }
00163     }
00164     if(words.size() - rowOffset != m_ColNames.size()) 
00165       Err::errAbort("Expecting " + ToStr(m_ColNames.size()) + " words but got " +
00166                       ToStr(words.size() - rowOffset) + " at line " + 
00167                       ToStr(rf.getCurrentLineNumber()));
00168 
00169     assert(words.size() > 0);
00170     if(m_UseRowNames) {
00171       name = Util::cloneString(words[0].c_str());
00172     }
00173     else {
00174       nameSpoof = Convert::toString(count);
00175       name = Util::cloneString(nameSpoof.c_str());
00176     }
00177     m_MemToFree.push_back(name);      
00178     if(m_RowNameMap.find(name) != m_RowNameMap.end())
00179       Err::errAbort("Duplicate name: " + words[0] + " in row names.");
00180     m_RowNameMap[name] = m_Data.size();
00181     if(m_UseRowNames) {
00182       m_RowNames.push_back(words[0]);
00183       words.erase(words.begin());
00184     }
00185     else {
00186       m_RowNames.push_back(nameSpoof);
00187     }
00188     m_Data.push_back( words  );
00189     count++;
00190   }
00191   rf.close();
00192   return true;
00193 }

00201 void TableFile::writeVector(std::ostream &out, std::vector<std::string> data, char delim) {
00202   unsigned int i = 0;
00203   for( i = 0; i < data.size() - 1; i++) {
00204     out << data[i];
00205     out.put(delim);
00206   }
00207   if(data.size() > 0)
00208     out << data[data.size()-1];
00209   out << endl;
00210 }
00211                  
00217 bool TableFile::write(const char *fileName) {
00218   assert(fileName);
00219   if(m_Data.empty()) 
00220     Err::errAbort("TableFile::write() - No data do write.");
00221     ofstream out(fileName);
00222     unsigned int i = 0;
00223     RowFile::writeHeader(out, m_HeaderLines);
00224     writeVector(out, m_ColNames, m_Delim);
00225   for(i = 0; i < m_Data.size(); i++) {
00226     out << m_RowNames[i];
00227     out.put(m_Delim);
00228     writeVector(out, m_Data[i], m_Delim);
00229   }
00230   return true;
00231 }

00244 bool TableFile::columnFromFile(const char *fileName, std::vector<std::string> &colVec, 
00245                                const char *colName, unsigned int skipCols, bool unique) {
00246   RowFile rf;
00247   vector<string> words;
00248   rf.open(fileName);
00249   unsigned int colIx = npos;
00250 
00251   /* Skip rows. */
00252   while(skipCols > 0 && rf.nextRow(words)) {
00253     skipCols--;
00254   }
00255   /* Make sure there is something after the skipped entries. */
00256   if(!(rf.nextRow(words)) || words.empty())
00257     Err::errAbort("Nothing after header in file: " + string(fileName));
00258   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00259     if(words[i] == colName) {
00260       if(colIx == npos) {
00261         colIx = i;
00262       }
00263       else {
00264         Verbose::out(1, "Warning: column name: " + ToStr(colName) + 
00265                 " occurs multiple times in: " + ToStr(fileName) + 
00266                 " using first column.");
00267       }
00268     }
00269   }
00270   /* Did we find a column with that name? */
00271   if(colIx == npos)
00272     return false;
00273   return columnFromRowFile(rf, colVec, colIx, unique);
00274 }
00275 
00287 bool TableFile::columnFromFile(const char *fileName, std::vector<std::string> &colVec, 
00288                                unsigned int colIx, unsigned int skipCols, bool unique) {
00289   RowFile rf;
00290   vector<string> words;
00291   rf.open(fileName);
00292 
00293   /* Skip rows. */
00294   while(skipCols > 0 && rf.nextRow(words)) {
00295     skipCols--;
00296   }
00297   /* Make sure there is something there. */
00298   if(!(rf.nextRow(words)) || words.empty())
00299     Err::errAbort("Nothing after header in file: " + string(fileName));
00300   rf.reuseLine();
00301   return columnFromRowFile(rf, colVec, colIx, unique);
00302 }
00303 
00314 bool TableFile::columnFromRowFile(RowFile &rf, std::vector<std::string> &colVec, 
00315                                unsigned int colIx, bool unique) {
00316   map<string,bool> seen;
00317   vector<string> words;
00318   string fileName = rf.getFileName();
00319   /* Read entries. */
00320   while(rf.nextRow(words)) {
00321     if(colIx >= words.size()) {
00322       Err::errAbort("Trying to read column: " + ToStr(colIx) + " from row with only: " + 
00323                       ToStr(words.size()) + " columns at line: " + ToStr(rf.getCurrentLineNumber()) +
00324                       " in file: " + fileName);
00325     }
00326     if(unique) {
00327       if(seen.find(words[colIx]) != seen.end()) {
00328         Err::errAbort("Entry: '" + words[colIx] + "' has already been seen in file: " + 
00329                         fileName + " in column " + ToStr(colIx) + ".");
00330       }
00331       else {
00332         seen[words[colIx]] = true;
00333       }
00334     }
00335     colVec.push_back(words[colIx]);
00336   }
00337   return true;
00338 }
